modName: Taliesina - A Bard for The Drunken Huntsman
summary: A Bosmer bard for The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Taliesina - A Bard for The Drunken Huntsman
[/u][/b][b]
[/b][b]This small mod adds a Bosmer bard to The Drunken Huntsman tavern in Whiterun.
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Updates

[/u][/b][b]1.12 Removed unnecessary added objects to maximize compatibility with mods that change the Drunken Huntsman.
[/b][b]1.11 Fixed issue of Taliesina not having her warpaint.
[/b][b]1.10 Â Minor change of name from Taliesin to Taliesina since it turns out that Taliesin is a male name.
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][b]
[/b][b]This mod is quite simple and should be compatible with all other mods. The only exception would be if a mod places an object or obstruction in the spot where Talisina performs.[/b][b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Installation - Nexus Mod Manager[/u]
[/b][b]
[/b][b]Use the "Download with Manager" button. Once the mod is in NMM make sure that NMM has the mod activated.[/b][b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Installation - Manual
[/u][/b][b]
[/b][b]Drop CDB_Taliesin.esp and CDB_Taliesin.bsa into your Data folder.[/b][b]Activate the mod using whatever management tool suits you.[/b][b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Uninstalling - Nexus Mod Manager
[/u][/b][b]
[/b][b]Simply deactivate and uninstall the mod from NMM as usual.[/b][b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Uninstalling - Manual
[/u][/b][b]
[/b][b]Delete CDB_Taliesin.esp and CDB_Taliesin.bsa from your Data folder.[/b][b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Load Order[/u][/b][b]
[/b][b]If you use a mod that changes The Drunken Huntsman and you find that Taliesina no longer acts as a bard you will need to make sure that CDB_Taliesin.esp comes after the other mod in the load order.[/b][b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][u]Licensing and Legal[/u][/b][b]
[/b][b]Redistribution is strictly forbidden without prior consent. This means do not upload it anywhere unless you have obtained permission from me.[/b]
author: DonB312
